name: Fatima's Space Invader Basic
description:
Fatima's Space Invader Basic

A vibrant version of a Space Invaders like game.

Instructions

Mouse movement to move the spaceship in horizontal axis.
Left mouse button to shoot and Right mouse button to pause.

Attributions

  • Space Shooter Redux art pack by Kenney Vleugels (Included sprites, background(later edited to my liking), SFX and font)
  • UI Pack by Kenney Vleugels (Included UI images and SFX)
  • Background music: 'Prism' by Bobby Richards from Youtube Audio Library
  • Laser beam sound from Epidemic Sound
  • Player ship collision sound from Epidemic Sound
  • The rest is self-created/designed
